properties.entry: INSERT INTO drivers_stampings (device_id, imei, card_serial, stmp_ts, wrt_ts) VALUES (:deviceId, :imei, :cardSerial, :stmpTs, :now)

INSERT INTO ob_oblits (obt_name, ticket_kind, nrecord, obl_ts, zone, line_code, line_name, vehicle_code, vehicle_name, ring, stoppoint_code, stoppoint_name, driver_code, driver_name, ticket_serial, ticket_id, ticket_type, ticket_duration, obl_result, deviceId, wrt_ts) VALUES (:obtName, :ticketKind, :numRecord, :oblTs, :zone, :lineCode, :lineName, :vehicleCode, :vehiclename, :ring, :stopPointCode, :stopPointName, :driverCode, :driverName, :ticketSerial, :ticketId, :ticketType, :ticketDuration, :oblResult, :deviceId, :now)
